articles.description: A rickety boat. Three guys. And a massive, deadly shark. What could go wrong? Not what you might be expecting with “The Shark Is Broken,” the play that opened Thursday about the trio of actors who enlivened the pioneering Steven Spielberg-directed movie “Jaws…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) A rickety boat. Three guys with egos. And a massive, deadly shark. What could go wrong?
Not what you might be expecting with The Shark Is Broken, the lyrical play that opened Thursday … [+4222 chars]
